sentences.en: Additional studies on cultivability of the organism have yielded important information.
sentences.cn: 此外关于该生物体培养力的研究,已经取得了一些重要的成果.

sentences.en: Additional studies on culturability of the organism have yielded important information.
sentences.cn: 此外关于细粒棘球绦虫培养力的研究,已经取得了一些重要的成果.

sentences.en: All living organisms have to adapt to changes in environmental conditions.
sentences.cn: 一切生物都要适应环境条件的变化。

sentences.en: An earthworm is a terricolous organism.
Gastric acidity would not prevent the organism from passing into the gut.
sentences.cn: 胃的酸度不能防止细菌进入肠道.

sentences.en: Genes operate together in determining the characteristics of an individual organism.
sentences.cn: 基因的共同作用决定生物个体的特性。

sentences.en: Genetic engineers transpose or exchange bits of hereditary material from one organism to the next.
sentences.cn: 遗传工程师将某一生物的小段遗传物质调换到另一生物，或与其互换。

sentences.en: It was an infectious organism that he studied.
sentences.cn: 他研究的是一种可传染病菌的微生物.

sentences.en: Outside the bovine host, the organism can be readily cultured.
sentences.cn: 这种微生物在宿主牛体外, 容易被培养.

sentences.en: Simple antibiotics are effective against this organism.
sentences.cn: 普通的抗生素就能够有效地抑制这种微生物。

sentences.en: Small lesions may exhibit no caseation, and no organism may be demonstrated.
sentences.cn: 微小病灶可不出现干酪性坏死, 也查不到细菌.

sentences.en: The amoeba is a very simple organism.
sentences.cn: 变形虫是很简单的生物体.

sentences.en: The economy is not a mechanical device but a living organism.
sentences.cn: 经济不是一套机械装置,而是活的有机体.

sentences.en: The erysipelas organism is quite resistant to salting, pickling, and smoking.
sentences.cn: 猪丹毒杆菌对盐腌, 酸浸, 烟熏很有抵抗力.

sentences.en: The intertidal beach unit contains some organism burrows.
sentences.cn: 潮间海滩单元含有一些生物潜穴.

sentences.en: The organism must be found again in the artificially infected host.
sentences.cn: 必须在人工侵染的寄主中,再次发现这种有机体.

sentences.en: When the organism dies, no new radioactive carbon is assimilated.
sentences.cn: 机体死后, 不能再吸取新的放射性碳.

words.tran_cn: [有化] 有机的；组织的；器官的；根本的
有组织的；组织起来的（等于organized）
有组织的；安排有秩序的；做事有条理的
有机地；有组织地；器官上地
[生物] 器官；机构；风琴；管风琴；嗓音
有机体说；唯器官变化论
组织者；承办单位；[生物] 组织导体
组织（等于organize）；有机化；给予生机
组织；使有系统化；给予生机；组织成立工会等

trans.tran_cn: 有机体，生物体，微生物，有机体系，有机组织
trans.tran_en: an animal, plant, human, or any other living thing
